column4: if I have a disk of 1 partition with xp in it, is it possible to just chop off a few pieces and create swap and etx3 on that without ruining my xp installation?
yes it is , you can use gparted from the live cd and the installer itself will give you the oportunity when the time comes
it woul still be a good idea to backup the important stuff and defrag before doing anything
